faq:
Q: How do I insert batteries into the Kairo device?
A: Insert 2xAA batteries into the battery compartment, and ensure the LED indicator turns on and flashes every 16 seconds.

messages.content:
तुमच्या प्लॉटच्या सिंचन सेटिंग्जनुसार, सिंचनासाठी लागणारे गणित केलेले तास 0.17 तास आहेत.

मी खालील सेटिंग्ज वापरल्या:
- रूट रुंदी: 8 इंच
- रूट खोली: 6 इंच
- मातीची धारणा: 180 मिमी
- ड्रिपर अंतर: 1.15 मिमी
- ड्रिपर डिस्चार्ज: 4 लिटर

तुम्हाला दुसऱ्या सेटिंग्जसह सिंचन तासांची गणना करायची आहे का? जर होय, तर कृपया नवीन मूल्ये द्या.
messages.en:
Depending on the irrigation settings of your plot, the calculated hours required for irrigation are 0.17 hours.

I used the following settings:
- Route width: 8 inches
- Root depth: 6 inches
- Soil retention: 180 mm
- Dripper distance: 1.15 mm
- Dripper discharge: 4 liters

Do you want to count irrigation hours with other settings? If yes, please give new values.

should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Plot no 1 Thompson" प्लॉटला सध्या पाण्याची गरज नाही. 

सध्याची मातीची आर्द्रता:
- माती आर्द्रता 1: 69%
- माती आर्द्रता 2: 78%

आवश्यक आर्द्रता:
- आदर्श 1: 60%
- आदर्श 2: 60%

सध्या मातीची आर्द्रता आदर्श आर्द्रतेच्या वर आहे, त्यामुळे पाण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.
messages.en:
Your "Plot No. 1 Thompson" plot doesn't need water right now. 

Current soil moisture:
- Soil moisture 1:69%
- Soil moisture 2:78%

Required humidity:
- Ideal 1: 60%
- Ideal 2: 60%

Currently, soil moisture is above ideal humidity, so there is no need for water.

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Plot no 1 Thompson" प्लॉटमध्ये सध्या "CANE MATURITY" (Topping) या सक्रिय अवस्थेत आहे. गर्भधारणा (Fruit Set) होण्यासाठी पुढील अवस्था "FRUIT PRUNING" आहे, जी अद्याप आलेली नाही. त्यामुळे गर्भधारणा झालेली नाही. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये गर्भधारणा होण्यासाठी पुढील अवस्थेची प्रतीक्षा करावी लागेल.
messages.en:
Your "Plot no 1 Thompson" plot currently has "CANE MATURITY" (Topping) in an active state. THE NEXT STAGE FOR GETTING A FRUIT SET IS "FRUIT PRUNING", WHICH HAS NOT YET OCCURRED. It did not cause pregnancy. 

You will have to wait for the next stage to conceive in your plot.

messages.content: कधी होईल
messages.en: When will it happen?
messages.standalone_question: When will it happen?
messages.standalone_en: When will it happen?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Plot no 1 Thompson" प्लॉटमध्ये गर्भधारणा (Fruit Set) होण्यासाठी "FRUIT PRUNING" अवस्था येईल. 

सक्रिय अवस्था "CANE MATURITY" 20 जून 2025 पासून सुरू आहे. "FRUIT PRUNING" अवस्था 20 जुलै 2025 पासून सुरू होईल. त्यामुळे गर्भधारणा 20 जुलै 2025 नंतर होईल. 

तुम्हाला याबद्दल अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
Your "Plot no 1 Thompson" plot will have a "FRUIT PRUNING" stage in order to conceive (Fruit Set). 

ACTIVE STATE "CANE MATURITY" BEGINS ON 20TH JUNE 2025. The "FRUIT PRUNING" stage will begin on July 20, 2025. So the pregnancy will take place after 20th July 2025. 

If you need more information about this, please let me know!

messages.content: शंभर टक्के गर्भधारणा झाली पाहिजे घड स्ट्रॉंग निघाले पाहिजे हीच अपेक्षा
messages.en: The only hope is that 100 per cent of the pregnancy should be done.
messages.standalone_question: Should there be a hundred percent fruit set, and should the plants be strong?
messages.standalone_en: Should there be a hundred percent fruit set, and should the plants be strong?
messages.content_transliterated: shambhar takke garbhadharana jhali pahije ghad strong nighale pahije heech apeksa

messages.content:
तुमच्या "Plot no 1 Thompson" प्लॉटमध्ये गर्भधारणा (Fruit Set) 20 जुलै 2025 पासून सुरू होईल. तुम्हाला शंभर टक्के गर्भधारणा आणि मजबूत फळे हवी आहेत, तर तुम्हाला योग्य काळजी घेणे आवश्यक आहे.

तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये योग्य पाण्याची व्यवस्था, खतांचा वापर, आणि रोग व कीटक नियंत्रण यावर लक्ष केंद्रित करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटच्या स्थितीवर लक्ष ठेवून, योग्य वेळी फळांची काळजी घेणे आणि आवश्यकतेनुसार पाणी व खत देणे आवश्यक आहे. तुम्हाला अधिक मार्गदर्शन हवे असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
The fruit set in your "Plot No. 1 Thompson" plot will begin on July 20, 2025. If you want 100 per cent pregnancy and strong fruits, you need to take proper care.

It is important to focus on proper water management, fertilizer use, and disease and pest control in your plot. 

It is important to monitor the condition of your plot, take care of the fruit at the right time and provide water and fertilizer as needed. If you need more guidance, please let me know!

messages.content: pH
messages.en: pH
messages.standalone_question: What is pH?
messages.standalone_en: What is pH?

messages.content:
pH is a measure of the acidity or alkalinity of the soil, which can significantly affect plant growth and nutrient availability. The pH scale ranges from 0 to 14, where:

- A pH of 7 is neutral.
- A pH below 7 indicates acidic soil.
- A pH above 7 indicates alkaline soil.

For most crops, including groundnut, an optimal pH range is typically between 6.0 and 7.5. It's essential to test the soil pH regularly to ensure it remains within this range for healthy crop growth. If you need specific recommendations for adjusting soil pH, please let me know!
messages.en:
pH is a measure of the acidity or alkalinity of the soil, which can significantly affect plant growth and nutrient availability. The pH scale ranges from 0 to 14, where:

- A pH of 7 is neutral.
- A pH below 7 indicates acidic soil.
- A pH above 7 indicates alkaline soil.

For most crops, including groundnut, an optimal pH range is typically between 6.0 and 7.5. It's essential to test the soil pH regularly to ensure it remains within this range for healthy crop growth. If you need specific recommendations for adjusting soil pH, please let me know!

messages.en: Soil ph does not saw in application
messages.standalone_question: Why is soil pH not visible in the application?
messages.standalone_en: Why is soil pH not visible in the application?

messages.content:
If the soil pH is not visible in your application, it may not be included in the current data being displayed. Here are a few steps you can take:

1. **Check Soil Testing**: Ensure that you have conducted a soil test that includes pH analysis. If not, consider getting a soil test done.

2. **Update the Application**: Make sure your application is updated to the latest version, as updates may include new features or data displays.

3. **Contact Support**: If the issue persists, it may be best to contact Fyllo's support team for assistance in retrieving soil pH data.

If you need help with anything else or have specific questions about your plots, feel free to ask!
messages.en:
If the soil pH is not visible in your application, it may not be included in the current data being displayed. Here are a few steps you can take:

1. **Check Soil Testing**: Ensure that you have conducted a soil test that includes pH analysis. If not, consider getting a soil test done.

2. **Update the Application**: Make sure your application is updated to the latest version, as updates may include new features or data displays.

3. **Contact Support**: If the issue persists, it may be best to contact Fyllo's support team for assistance in retrieving soil pH data.

If you need help with anything else or have specific questions about your plots, feel free to ask!

messages.content: बुटींग काळात m45 व टाटा मेडा फवारणी घेऊ का
messages.ans: 3 tools for sprey should be called
messages.en: Should we spray m45 and Tata Meda during the booting period?
messages.standalone_question: Should I apply M45 and Tata Meda during the flowering period?
messages.standalone_en: Should I apply M45 and Tata Meda during the flowering period?
messages.content_transliterated: butting kalat m45 v tata meda favarani gheu ka

messages.content: सध्या बुटींग काळात M45 आणि टाटा मेडा फवारणी घेण्याची आवश्यकता नाही, कारण कोणतीही पूर्वनिर्धारित फवारणीची शेड्यूल नाही. तुम्ही फवारणी घेऊ शकता, पण याबाबत अधिक माहिती किंवा सल्ला घेणे चांगले ठरेल.
messages.en: Currently, there is no need to take M45 and Tata Meda spraying during the butting period, as there is no predetermined spraying schedule. You can spray, but it would be best to seek more information or advice.

messages.content: या अगोदर बाविस्टीन व डिशेस घेतले आहे
messages.en: I've had bavistin and dishes before
messages.standalone_question: Have you previously used Bavistin and Dishes?
messages.standalone_en: Have you previously used Bavistin and Dishes?
messages.content_transliterated: ya agodar bavistin v dishes ghetale aahe

messages.content:
जर तुम्ही याआधी बाविस्टीन आणि डिशेस फवारणी घेतली असेल, तर तुम्हाला पुढील फवारणीसाठी योग्य अंतर ठेवणे आवश्यक आहे. बुटींग काळात फवारणीसाठी योग्य वेळ आणि उत्पादने निवडणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. 

तुमच्या पिकाच्या स्थितीवर आणि हवामानाच्या परिस्थितीवर आधारित, तुम्ही पुढील फवारणीसाठी योग्य सल्ला घेऊ शकता. अधिक माहिती किंवा सल्ला हवे असल्यास, कृपया संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
If you've sprayed Bavistin and Dishes before, you'll need to keep a proper distance for the next spray. It is important to choose the right time and products for spraying during the butting period. 

Depending on your crop conditions and weather conditions, you can seek appropriate advice for further spraying. If you need more information or advice, please get in touch.

messages.content: For fertility
messages.en: For fertility
messages.standalone_question: What can you tell me about fertility for this plot?
messages.standalone_en: What can you tell me about fertility for this plot?

tools:
get_specific_fertigation_requirements  
Finds the fertigation requirements for the plots with a particular crop stage and week numbers.

messages.content:
For your plot "Shashidhar thomson 3 acar," currently in the **Topping** stage (Week 4), here is the fertigation schedule:

### Current Week (Week 4)
- **Fertilizers to Apply:**
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 1.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 2.5 kg/acre

### Next Week (Week 5)
- **Fertilizers to Apply:**
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 2.5 kg/acre
- **Start Date of Week 5:** October 23, 2025

Make sure to follow this schedule for optimal growth and health of your grape crop! If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask.
